item.title: Jupyter Notebook
item.description: Summary The Jupyter project and all its interfaces have become highly popular in the last years. In this course we will go through the basic use of the different interfaces: Jupyter Notebook and Jupyter Lab. Finally, we will spend a little bit of time checking how we can make the content of the school and the project reproducible. Slides as PDF This browser does not support PDFs. Please download the PDF to view it: Download PDF.
